title: COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space with 6.48ft², 600W Dehydrated Dryer, 6 Stainless Steel Trays, 48H Timer, 165°F Temperature Control, for Herbs, Meat, Fruit, and Yogurt, Silver
descriptions:
**COSORI Premium Stainless Steel Food Dehydrator for Jerky with Large Drying Space**

Transform your kitchen into a haven for healthy, homemade snacks with the COSORI Food Dehydrator, meticulously designed in California for the discerning home chef. Whether you're crafting your own jerky, drying fruits, or making tasty vegetable chips, this dehydrator offers the perfect combination of style, functionality, and durability.

**Key Features:**

- **Efficient Power**: Equipped with a 600W motor, ensuring your food dries quickly and evenly.
- **Large Capacity**: Boasting 6.5 square feet of drying space across 6 stainless steel trays, each measuring 12 x 13 inches, you'll have plenty of room for big batches.
- **Precision Drying**: The hot air circulation from the rear fan, paired with a broad temperature range of 95°–165°Fahrenheit, means you can find the perfect conditions for drying any type of food.
- **Intuitive Controls**: The digital touch-control LED display makes operation a breeze, complete with a timer (up to 48 hours) and memory function for your convenience.
- **Quiet Operation**: With a noise level below 48dB, this machine won't disrupt your household as it works.
- **Safety First**: Features like auto shutoff and overheat protection give you peace of mind.
- **Easy to Clean**: The stainless steel trays are dishwasher safe, making cleanup as simple as snack preparation.
- **Modern Design**: A sleek glass door allows you to monitor progress without interrupting the drying process.
- **Recipe Inspiration**: Comes with 50 included recipes to kickstart your dehydrating journey.
- **Additional Accessories**: Includes 1 mesh screen (10.7 x 11.8 inches) and 1 fruit roll sheet (11.3 x 12.8 inches) to diversify your dehydrating options.
- **Energy Specifications**: 120V voltage and 60Hz frequency, compatible with USA and Canada electrical standards.
- **Shelf Life Extension**: Preserve your food's nutrients and flavors, extending the shelf life and reducing waste.

The COSORI Food Dehydrator is more than just a kitchen appliance; it's an investment in a healthier lifestyle. Whether you're a seasoned food preserver or a beginner eager to explore the benefits of dehydrated food, this machine is sure to become a cherished addition to your culinary repertoire. Get ready to enjoy homemade snacks that are as nutritious as they are delicious!

**Product Listing: COSORI Premium Food Dehydrator for Jerky with Large Drying Space**

Experience the art of dehydration with the COSORI Food Dehydrator, meticulously designed in the innovation hub of California. This sleek kitchen gadget is not just an appliance; it's your next step towards healthier, homemade snacks with a professional touch.

**Key Features:**

- **Power and Efficiency**: A robust 600W power rating ensures quick and even drying. Your jerky, fruits, and veggies will be ready in no time with a maximum temperature of 165°F.
- **Spacious Design**: With 6.48ft² of drying space spread over 6 stainless steel trays (12 x 13 inches each), you'll have plenty of room to dehydrate large batches of your favorite foods.
- **Optimal Air Flow**: Thanks to the hot air circulation from the rear fan, your food dries evenly with all the flavors and nutrients locked in.
- **Precision Control**: Digital temperature control from 95° to 165°F and a timer up to 48 hours let you customize the dehydration process to suit various recipes and ingredients.
- **Quiet Operation**: At less than 48dB, this dehydrator works silently in the background, allowing you to go about your day without noisy interruptions.
- **Convenience & Safety**: Touch-control LED display, dishwasher-safe trays, auto shutoff, and overheat protection features combine convenience with safety.
- **Visibility and Ease**: A transparent glass door and touch control LED display make monitoring the dehydration process a breeze, while the memory function keeps your settings for next time.
- **Ready to Use**: Comes with a mesh screen, a fruit roll sheet, and 50 included recipes to get you started. Each accessory is designed to fit perfectly within the dehydrator.
- **Built for North America**: Compatible with 120V and designed for use in the USA and Canada, this dehydrator is ready to plug in and go.

**What's in the Box:**

- COSORI Food Dehydrator
- 6 Stainless Steel Trays
- 1 Mesh Screen (10.7 x 11.8 inches)
- 1 Fruit Roll Sheet (11.3 x 12.8 inches)
- 50-Recipe Book
- User Manual

Whether you're a jerky enthusiast, a health-conscious snacker, or an experimental chef, the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky is your perfect partner in preservation. Extend the shelf life of your foods naturally and savor the homemade goodness for months to come!
